articles.author: Brian Melley, Emma Burrows
articles.title: UK's Starmer says Europe is at ‘crossroads in history’ as leaders agree to steps to Ukraine peace - The Associated Press
articles.description: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer has rallied his European counterparts to shore up their borders and throw their full weight behind Ukraine as he announced outlines of a plan to end Russia’s war. “Every nation must contribute to that in the best way that i…
articles.content: LONDON (AP) British Prime Minister Keir Starmer rallied his European counterparts Sunday to shore up their borders and throw their full weight behind Ukraine as he announced outlines of a plan to end… [+6783 chars]
